content:
#ObjFW now has an initial ASN.1 DER parser.

https://heap.zone/git/objfw.git/commit/?id=0f1899cf2059de34dfc0370920e2b40e4a112ac8

I don't understand why people keep complaining about ASN.1 / DER being too complex. From that commit, it can be seen how trivial it is.

And yes, this in preparation for writing an X.509 and then a TLS implementation long run 😉.

account.note: An alternative Objective-C framework and runtime, bringing Objective-C to any platform!

content:
There's a lot going on here in the way of *responsible* marijuana sale. The fact that provinces are scrambling to provide sale infrastructure before legality arrives shows how much they believe people will openly consume and how much money they believe they'll get in taxes 👌

I think that Quebec might just be able to support themselves for once with this change

content: #Telegram is down... Terribly annoying

We just rode out a tornado warning. All we had was lots of rain, nickel sized hail, thunder, lightning and heavy winds. Our road is flooded so we can't get out and there's another tornadic storm brewing to our west.
